website_summaries.verdict: Best option for those who don't want to stick anything into their ear canals.
pros: Reviewers say this kit unclogged their ears faster than other products
Includes drops and a bulb syringe
Drops crackle as they work to loosen wax
Some users get great results from drops alone
cons: Be prepared to use the drops and bulb for up to 4 days to remove all wax

customer_reviews.title: Be patient, this works.
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver. I was almost completely deaf in my left ear for 5 days, and in 1 night, Debrox cleared the blockage, and put me back to normal. Yeah, I had to spray the warm water pretty hard for it to work, and it took a lot of tries. But the longer I waited after using the solution, the more effective it was. It is definitely safe to say that the blockage I was experiencing was one of the more extreme ones, but this worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Best gift? I hear like I was 20 years
customer_reviews.text: Stuff works. I can't say it's pleasant experience using it, but seeing the chunks of goo wash out? Worth it. Best gift? I hear like I was 20 years younger
customer_reviews.author: doug chase

customer_reviews.title: Wow.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness. This thing works like a charm. Amazing product be prepared to hear like when you were a child. I was not a believer but let me tell you this thing gets gunk out of your ears you did not think you had in there. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus C.

customer_reviews.title: The liquid works but the bulb is pointless
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seeing videos of large amounts of built up debris come out of people ears after using this but it did not work like that for me. The liquid does make it feel like its breaking up build up but when I used the bulb it came with to rinse it out, not only did nothing come out, but it filled my ear with water and was SUPER uncomfortable, eventually I got it out but it was not a fun experience. I would not suggest this for someone who actualy feels blocked, but maybe just a routine ear cleaning...without the bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real messy
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I didn't give this enuff time to work (3 days). What I can say is it is a bit messy. I eventually went to an ENT specialist and he told me this product may work for some folks...primarily those with a medium amount of build up but for those with a thick deposit...he said it usually just makes it mushy and will not break it up enuff to flush it out without the aid of an ENT specialist who has the proper equipment to get it done.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Works. I can hear again
customer_reviews.text: My right ear hae been kinda muffled for the past 2 weeks. So I've been trying to clean my ear for a while to no effect, but this stuff helped me clear out whatever was in my ear. Really the bulb sryinge is whaat I need, nonetheless it works
customer_reviews.author: Brandon N.

customer_reviews.title: Lost a bit of hearing after following directions.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions on the box for this product which are fairly vague. It bubbles and tingled a bit when I put it in. Upon trying to drain my ear I realized something went wrong. My hearing in that ear is partially muffled and it feels similar to when you get water stuck in your ear after swimming. I will be going to a doctor in the next couple days to get it checked out. I will not be using this method of earwax removal in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Works well on dirty or clogged up ears
customer_reviews.text: Works well on dirty or clogged up ears, and after 15 to 20 minutes you can use the water bulb to rinse the excess ear wax out of my ears, but I preferred fairly warm water to get all the ear wax out of my ears. This is the 5th box of Debrox I have bought from Amazon in two years.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore H Rahm

customer_reviews.title: Effective, Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: For the first time in a fairly long life, I experienced an external, severe blockage in one ear. This kit was recommended to me by a friendly pharmacist, and I gave it a try. One treatment was 100% effective. Definitely a 5-star experience!
customer_reviews.author: Prisoner of Planet Moron

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty disappointed by this. Followed the directions, even waiting a little longer according than reviews. I literally got NOTHING out of my ears. I was only doing this for a routine cleaning. I use q-tips everyday, so I figured there would be some sort of buildup where i couldn’t reach. Well nothing came out with flushing or with a q-tip. I wouldn’t waste your money on this honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Sam D.

customer_reviews.title: Do not use unless you want to risk it getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not use unless you want to risk it getting stuck in your ears for days. Luckily I only did one ear and realized it wasn’t coming out. It took three days for my ear to become unclogged from this stuff. I even tried flushing it many times with the bulb that came with
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't use.
customer_reviews.text: I am with the other negative reviews. This made my problem worse. Very difficult to get out of my ear, and the wax melted, and clogged my ear even worse. Go to your doctor, and let him clean your ears if you have an earwax problem.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: This product is literally impossible to use on your own. Youre supposed to flush out the liquid, after a couple mins, but you cant flush it out without tilting your head, but when you tilt your head, youre also tilting the baster, therefore no water comes out. When i did finally manage to do it, nothing came out, and it just further plugged up my ear.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Try Baby oil instead
customer_reviews.text: Over priced. Useless. Give a foaming sensation that product is working but isn't. Pick up a bottle of baby oil a ear/eye droppers instead. Use water to gently flush baby oil out of ear
customer_reviews.author: Fart-tron

customer_reviews.title: Gave me an infection
customer_reviews.text: I used the product just like the instructions said until there was no more in the bottle. Ater all that, I still couldn't half hear so I went to the doc. He said my ear had an inflammation and had signs of bleeding inside from the drops. After he washed my ears out, treated me with antibiotics, I can finally hear again.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do anything
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work, followed directions nothing happened. Seems it did the same thing water would do. I didn't have any pain like others said, I wonder if they had tubes in their ears. Warm it before using for comfort
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Toepfer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a god send. My ear was so impacted I couldn’t hear and it had so much pressure it was painful. Left this in for a half hour and flushed it quite a few times and got everything out. My only complaint is that it’s not the most comfortable thing to go through but more than worth it if you can get past the tickling feeling and not mess with it.
customer_reviews.author: kkelseys

customer_reviews.title: Used them on my toddler a couple times. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Used them on my toddler a couple times. It doesnt move the wax closer to the outside of the ear, but does soften the wax so it’s easier to grab with a specialized tool or q tip. I was too scared to flush her ear with water. She didn’t mind it too much either.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Larson

customer_reviews.title: Did help
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get huge chunks out of my ear, but it did work. Have to use a lot more drops than the box says and leave it in longer but over all happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Loud dog

customer_reviews.title: Here's your tip for the day...
customer_reviews.text: Don't spend the money on this useless item. Go get yourself a $.99 bottle of hydrogen peroxide and pop a few drops of that in your ears - worked like a charm after this did nothing.
customer_reviews.author: KEE

customer_reviews.title: Great for wax build up and sawdust
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband. He always has wax build up from wearing ear plugs at his job and I sure it helps with removing sawdust from his ears too. He says it is the best product he has used.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L Riley

customer_reviews.title: ear wax removal
customer_reviews.text: I tried this a couple of times and really did not see any difference. Oddly, it has been about 3 months since I tried it and sometimes when I bend forward my left ear plugs up like there is still solution / fluid trapped in there?
customer_reviews.author: D Webster

customer_reviews.title: Did not work well for me
customer_reviews.text: THE INSTRUCTIONS EXPLAINED THAT THERE WOULD BE A FIZZING REACTION IN THE EAR (PROBABLY SIMILAR TO WHAT IS EXPERIENCED WITH HYDROGEN PEROXIDE). THERE WAS NOTHING AT ALL. I USED THE PRODUCT SEVERAL TIMES OVER 2 WEEKS. NO WAX REMOVED. NO HEARING IMPROVEMENT. PRODUCT WAS WITHIN IT'S EXPIRATION DATE BY A FULL YEAR. IT JUST DIDN'T WORK FOR ME.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but didnt do much
customer_reviews.text: This product just didnt do anything for me. I could feel it doing something in my ears but when I used the rinse thing, nothing came out at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shandra mcnally

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended over my previous method of hydrogen peroxide/ warm water mix. It does the job but take more time than my previous method.
customer_reviews.author: Sailfish

customer_reviews.title: One of the very few methods actually approved for treatment of earwax buildup.
customer_reviews.text: One of the very few methods actually approved for treatment of earwax buildup.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie B.

customer_reviews.title: Gets wax out
customer_reviews.text: Drops in ear for a few days and wax will come out when you flush with water
customer_reviews.author: Smokey

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for me. Still can’t hear out of my right ear. When I washed it out, nothing came out. I left it in for 15mins and nothing happened besides the popping. I wish this could’ve worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Geegee

customer_reviews.title: Try this product
customer_reviews.text: Good for cleaning out wax i recommend every couple of months
customer_reviews.author: Spoilers21

customer_reviews.title: Worked extremely well.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for 4 days and it cleared my ear. worked very well and was easy to use. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony.en09

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do anything at all. I had high hopes when I bought this and was ready for some nastiness that I know is in there to come out, but nothing happened. I've had better luck with hydrogen peroxide.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Roof

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: This product is snake oil. It didn't help at all even after a week.
customer_reviews.author: BMXmike78

customer_reviews.title: EAR INFECTION :(
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately got a double ear infection from these drops. I dont recommend,
customer_reviews.author: Katalina

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I had to use it twice before my ears became completely clear. Arrived on time, convenient and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Ceectee

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Wow this works so well I have been having issues with my ear getting plugged and this has worked the best!
customer_reviews.author: mallory

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Got my ear unstopped. It took a while longer than it said on the instructions though.
customer_reviews.author: JackTheCat

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Simply doesn’t work. The warm water actually got stuck in my ear canal making it even more painful. Go to an ENT....that’s what I did. I told him I tried to use this product & he rollled his eyes & said “Lef me guess....didn’t work, right?”
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G

customer_reviews.title: Made my hearing worse
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t work at all, and if anything made my ears & hearing worse than when I started with muffled hearing in one ear, now both are experiencing much worse hearing.
customer_reviews.author: Lukas B.

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me worth a try still
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work for others didn’t personally work for me glad it didn’t cost much to not work worth a try even if it doesn’t work for you too
customer_reviews.author: Matt Gebo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter, she did not need it. Returned no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Kathy

customer_reviews.title: was great. However
customer_reviews.text: This product came as promised - the shipping, etc. was great. However, I do not really think the product to be that effective. If you are looking to just clean your ears out, it may be a great product for you. However, if you are trying to unclog your ears or anything more serious, this product is not really going to do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Ferrero

customer_reviews.title: Okay 👍
customer_reviews.text: Did get rid of some earwax but nothing like the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Chepe509

customer_reviews.title: Opened & missing piece piece
customer_reviews.text: This box was already opened . Also it’s missing the piece you need to get the wax out . Extremely disappointed! they do not except returns or else I would try to contact them!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: try for better product.
customer_reviews.text: doesn't work just made a sound in ears. ear wax never came out. try for better product..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No seal on bottle
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived without a safety seal on the product and it leaked all over the box will not use
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried different earwax products without luck. This one is very easy to use and works. I plan on buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Doggy mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice product highly recommend. Reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I recommended using it! I was an easy at first to used it to my 7 years old but his doctor recommended to do it at home since he don’t do it in his office anymore liability wise so we have to go to a specialist to do it. This product is really good just need to follow the instruction its very simple and efficient I will used it again in the future if we have too, and it’s not as expensive like the other product.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: In fact it makes things worse! I’ve done it multiple times like people said ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worthless! Does nothing to remove wax. In fact it makes things worse! I’ve done it multiple times like people said to do and still nothing! Save yourself the coin and just make a trip to the doc instead cause this stuff simply doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but it not clean wax as completely as I expected
customer_reviews.author: nadgorny

customer_reviews.title: Don't clean out your ears daily!
customer_reviews.text: The ear wax protects the delicate skin from infections. I check my hearing and use this effective product every 6 months or so when I notice a build up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonrockskcsworld

customer_reviews.title: It didn't really work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know that this really did anything for me. I guess that it may have been helpful to me, but I didn't really feel an improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Maples

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and low cost. Who could ask for more?
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST way to clean out your ears without having to go to the doctor. Easy to use and low cost. Who could ask for more?
customer_reviews.author: D. Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Either have to return to Amazon or just suck up the fact that I paid roughly twice what ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not include the bulb as advertised, only the actual debrox. Either have to return to Amazon or just suck up the fact that I paid roughly twice what I should have.
customer_reviews.author: Luke R. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item received
customer_reviews.text: Received the drops only no ear bulb included Product was opened
customer_reviews.author: Deyon

customer_reviews.title: ... without the bulb and not wrapped in shrink wrap like the listing warns it should be
customer_reviews.text: This showed up without the bulb and not wrapped in shrink wrap like the listing warns it should be. Just returned it and attempted to order a new one. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Requires Repeated Use
customer_reviews.text: Debrox works well to help remove built up ear wax, but it requires regular use... and that's just not something I'm going to do. I don't enjoy pouring things into my ears, listening to them bubble and gurgle like Gargamel's stomach when he sees a smurf, and then having to squirt water into my ear to get the stuff out... so, I just use a little soap and water when I'm in the shower. I can't see inside my ears, so i don't know how well the soap and water is working, but I can tell you that it doesn't make me dizzy or nauseous like using debrox does, so I'll just stick with what I know.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very effective!
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit I was hesitant to use this, but it was either this or make a doctor's appointment. I noticed results after my first use. The rinsing bulb included absolutely helped because I felt like it cleaned out a majority of the wax once the drops did their job. I'll definitely buy this product again because it was well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: A K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value. Loosens Wax so you can remove it easier
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to work great the first couple times I used it but the wax pack deeper down in your ear is harder and more compressed and meeds more than water to flush it out. I used this a few days before my doctors appointment to get the easy wax out, and then right before my appointment I let each ear soak with about 10 drops in each ear then I flushed my ears and when I got to my doctor I had the nurse use their tools to dig out the compressed wax. The nurses way isn't painless like the drops but these drops made it not nearly as painful as it could have been.
customer_reviews.author: Grave Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: The kit gives you everything you need to clean the ear of wax. At a doctors appointment the physician said I had a wax buildup in my right ear, she didn’t have tool to clear. I bought debrox kit and used it-the next week I saw my primary doctor and had it checked. He was impressed the debrox had cleared the wax all away.
customer_reviews.author: Grammylove

customer_reviews.title: This stuff REALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This stuff REALLY WORKS! I did it for four days in a row, in the beginning I thought it wasn't working because my ear kept getting more and more clogged but the 4th day was the best...now I can hear much better!...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I went in for a check up and my doctor told me my left ear was impacted with wax, over the next few days I tried a couple of other products, however nothing seemed to be working, got this in tonight and 20 minutes later a large raisin size ball of wax fell out of my left ear , (gross) my hearing instantly improved Its really quite amazing
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Nystrom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use - But was Allergic
customer_reviews.text: Only giving it a 3 because I had an allergic reaction to it. We only used 5 drops per ear. The next morning my face was very puffed up, I had hives and rash. I let my doctor be aware. Maybe test it first with 1 small drop. Was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Jones

customer_reviews.title: This product was recommended to us by our local walk in clinic Dr(who ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to us by our local walk in clinic Dr(who we've been going to for years). Works extremely well!
customer_reviews.author: Ultraman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Debrox is awesome, helps my girlfriend actually be able to hear!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Russell

customer_reviews.title: Unsure
customer_reviews.text: My ear still felt wet after. I was worried that it was going to cause an ear infection.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel E.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Only used once so far, but seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amberjack915

customer_reviews.title: Plugs
customer_reviews.text: All it did was plug my ear, so if your ears get plugged easily DO NOT USE THIS. Otherwise it was fine
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Try Something Else
customer_reviews.text: I used it according to the instructions and my ears didn't get cleaned out at all.
customer_reviews.author: James123

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy way to safely clean out ear wax residue
customer_reviews.author: Ron Tissier

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY!!! DANGEROUS!
customer_reviews.text: Item ruined my hearing. STAY AWAY. Used it two days ago, still cant hear properly. About to go see a doctor.
customer_reviews.author: nick pearman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned out my ears with one use and no more ear infections.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to use. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I put drops in and waited 5 min. I then flushed my ear and was amazed at the results. 👂❤
customer_reviews.author: Brian Pipes

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Product came unsealed and I was unable to use it since the Box said not to use it if it came unsealed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me (on the 3rd application)
customer_reviews.text: As the title says, it took three tries over 3 days but then it worked. I'd put a photo of what came out, but really, who wants to see that? Is it weird that all I can smell is ear wax right now? :)
customer_reviews.author: Alan G MCSPORRAN

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Probable not a bad product just didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: th13thstar

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I've used it before and it's an excellent product to safely remove earwax
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me- even with the help of my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Tried to clean my ears with this four months ago ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried to clean my ears with this four months ago, ended up with tinnitus. Leave the cleaning to a professional.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on a very clogged ear
customer_reviews.text: Got it in 3 days. Worked great on a very clogged ear
customer_reviews.author: Amelia G

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Too sticky, plugs up ear worse than before.wont use again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T. Clune

customer_reviews.title: So I purchased the Smart Swab (as seen on TV) and guess what
customer_reviews.text: It does loosen wax (thank you Debrox), however, the squirter thing it came with didn't quite work - no ear wax came out of my ears. Tried it for the full 4 days treatment (twice a day). I know I needed something that would pull the ear wax out. So I purchased the Smart Swab (as seen on TV) and guess what? That worked, pulled all the ear wax out in pieces. Over the next few days, I just let my ears naturally clean itself out and within a week or so, it all drained out. But notice, it took about 2 weeks for everything to come out. But it's nice and hear clearly again :)
customer_reviews.author: LT Turner Jr

customer_reviews.title: Product not as described
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the kit and it only came with the cleaner, no syringe, other than that it works great, just wish amazon would rid the false advertising
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Upstate NY

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my elderly Mom. Her ears were clogged and her hearing was compromised. I thought it couldn't hurt to try until her Dr was available for an appointment. Ended up doing about 3 applications back to back in an afternoon. I know that is not how it should be administered, but it worked. Cleared up some of the blockage and with q tips I was able to remove a good amount of wax. Saved a trip to the doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Christine H

customer_reviews.title: All I can say is wow.
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is W.O.W.. It cleared YEARS of wax in just a few days. After trying Hydrogen Peroxide and other kinds of home remedies, nothing else worked. I give this product a 100/100, because a 10/10 leaves too little room for 9.8's. If you're on the fence, please, try this first. It's only a few dollars and it works miracles.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as intended
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice and followed the instructions perfectly but nothing came out. I used a Qtip after to verify that my ears were clean and they were NOT clean. Product didn’t do anything. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Walker

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This works very well for my fiance. We are never without it, and I definitely recommend giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: saturday mourning

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all. Followed directions but it didn't get any ear wax out. Ended up shipping it back the following day. Luckily the company refunded my money asap though.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Recommended to me by my doctor for keeping ear wax ...
customer_reviews.text: Recommended to me by my doctor for keeping ear wax controlled. Apply to each ear, once a month, before a shower. Easy!
customer_reviews.author: BradHip

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me $12 lost, do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: H G

product_meta.title: Debrox Earwax Removal Kit, Includes 0.5 oz Earwax Removal Drops and Ear Syringe Bulb
product_meta.description: Size:0.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)| Style:Earwax removal KitDebrox Earwax Removal Kit includes a soft rubber bulb syringe to rinse your ear after using Debrox Earwax Removal Drops. Excessive earwax build-up can lead to ear discomfort and reduced hearing, which can affect your day-to-day life. Debrox Earwax Removal Drops are a safe and inexpensive in-home solution. Debrox's gentle, non-irritating microfoam cleansing action goes to work to soften and loosen earwax. When drops are placed in the ear, oxygen is released. This release allows Debrox to foam on contact as it gently softens and loosens earwax. Once broken down, earwax is able to drain from the ear and ears are relieved of built-up earwax so you can return back to daily life without muffled hearing caused by excess earwax. Trust Debrox to help keep your ears – and hearing – clear. Debrox is the #1 doctor & pharmacist recommended brand for earwax removal*. *IQVIA Claim Substantiation Validation Statement, 12/1/18 - 11/30/19; Pharmacy Times 2019 Annual Pharmacists Survey
feature_bullets: Easily Cleanses Ear with Microfoam Action.
Kit Includes Soft Rubber Bulb Ear Syringe and Drops.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
